name: The Greatest Story Ever Told
description:
BEFORE YOU PLAY, INSTALL RTP FOR RPG MAKER XP https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/run-time-package

This may aswell be the greatest story in video game history, it is only downhill from here.

[WARNING! THIS GAME AND ITS STORY MAKE NO SENSE AT ALL, I JUST STARTED MAKING SOMETHING IN A TRIAL OF RPGMAKERXP]

Music is mostly korn midis and whatever i had lying around.

Car sprite from: http://www.clipartbest.com/clipart-RTGy8nrkc

City tileset taken from Supercow Modern sets: https://www.rpgmaker.pl/?co=download&typ=rpgxp&id=rpgxp-tilesets

Pretty much every other sprites are stock rpg maker ones, aside from characters and the weird color thingy tileset which were made by yours truly.

Menu/Game over screen by yours truly.
